results.title: Bathroom Rules - Bathroom Decor -  Vinyl Wall Decal - Home Decor
results.description:
♥ HOW TO PLACE AN ORDER ♥

1. Choose Size from drop down menu. Please note that decal is not necessarily scaled to any particular size shown in photo. Your decal will be the size that you select from the drop down menu. Please measure your space prior to ordering to ensure it will fit. 

2. Vinyl Colors: Please see drop down menu for vinyl colors. Colors are shown in photos. If you don't see the color you need, please message us to see how we can accommodate your order. 

♥ DISCLAIMER AND ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ♥

Sample photos shown are only for demonstration purposes only. They are not to scale with the size of the item you are purchasing. Please see the sizes available and pre measure your space to ensure the decal will fit where you want it placed. If you don’t see the size you need, please message us to see if we can set up a custom order. 

-	Decals apply to smooth, flat surfaces
-	Decals do not have a background and are one solid color
-	Decals are not reusable
-       If you want to be sure that the vinyl will stick to the surface and want to test it before purchasing a full decal, you can order a sample for $2.00 (this includes shipping the sample).

*Please see our FAQ section below prior to purchasing! 

♥ Please review OUR Shop Policies and Procedures prior to purchasing and feel free to message me with any  questions. Thank you for visiting Riley K Designs! ♥

results.title: Live LOVE Laugh Words Quote Typography INSTANT DOWNLOAD Subway Style Wall Decor PRiNTABLE Digital Wall Art Vintage Style Writing Print 5178
results.description:
This listing is for a digital download of “Live LOVE Laugh Words Quote Typography INSTANT DOWNLOAD Subway Style Wall Decor PRiNTABLE Digital Wall Art Vintage Style Writing Print 5178“.
  
You will receive a sharp, clear, crisp, high quality digital image in jpeg format done at 300 dpi.   Included are 3 files – a 5 x 7 inch file, an 8 x 10 inch file, and a 16 x 20 inch file.  The image could be enlarged further, but that is best done by a professional printer with the right software to resize the image so that it retains it’s high resolution.  We recommend that a professional printer be used for all items used as Wall Art as they have the archival paper, archival inks and technology to make the image look best and last for years without fading. However, good results can easily be achieved using a home printer.  Good sturdy paper or cardstock can be purchased from local arts and crafts stores for that purpose.

Our watermark appears on the listing’s photo but there will be no watermark on the purchased image. The frame shown in the listing photo is not included in the digital download image. 

Our images are digital downloads which are downloaded and printed at home or with a professional printer.  No physical frames are included and no physical image will be shipped. 

You may download your image immediately after purchasing through Etsy’s download system.  You will receive an email from Etsy with a link to the download.  Or, if you prefer, you may click the “you” icon at the top of this page.  Choose “Purchases and Reviews”.  That will take you to your purchase history.  Scroll down to the purchase you made from us and there will be a button to the right where you can click to download the image. 

COPYRIGHT: This is a digital image store for creating your own wall art. You may print this item as many times as you wish for your own personal use. They are intended for PERSONAL USE only. Please read all of our Etsy polices for specific terms of use and copyright information.  If you wish to use our images for COMMERCIAL USE,  ie. printed as a tangible item  for sale, please contact us for commercial use licensing information..  We do not allow our images to be used commercially in any digital form whatsoever, whether as downloads or on digital media.  We do not allow the use of our images in any digital compilations, collages, or collections for sale or as freebies or promotional gifts.   If you have questions, please feel free to convo us.

RETURNS/CANCELLATIONS:  Due to the digital nature of our product and the method by which it is provided (downloads through Etsy), we cannot refund or cancel orders.  However, if you have any problems downloading your images or any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

SHARE THE LOVE:
 
If you have used or printed this image and have taken photos, please feel free to share them on your feedback.  We love seeing how customers use our images.  

THANK YOU so much for visiting our shop and viewing our listing of “Live LOVE Laugh Words Quote Typography INSTANT DOWNLOAD Subway Style Wall Decor PRiNTABLE Digital Wall Art Vintage Style Writing Print 5178“.   

If you love our work, please favorite this image and/or our shop.  Thanks again.

results.title: This Is My Wish For You Sign Distressed and Antiqued Laser Engraved
results.description:
Thanks for stopping by our shop and please do not hesitate to ask questions or make special requests. Great subway sign for your porch. 

This handpainted personalized sign is made to order. Shipment is generally 7 to 10 business days. Sign shown is in Barn Red and Antique White. We have used several different fonts with this saying to provide some character.  There are various color choices to choose from but if you don't see what you are looking for, please let us know and we will see if we can make it happen for you. Keep in mind when selecting the color options listed, the first color is the base color, while the second color is the top coat. 

Each sign measures approximately 12 inches by 16 inches. For this sign we use blondewood, approx. 3/8 inch thick.  Our handcrafted creations are made using a 7 step process which creates a beautiful expression to be cherished for years to come. Two contrasting colors of paint are applied first. Then the saying is applied to the sign, with a fine hairline used on all of the lettering which gives an awesome touch. After those steps are completed the sign is cleaned and goes through our antiquing process with edges distressed, giving it the final touches. Ready to Hang with hanger attached on the back side. 

Please note these signs are not massed produced but each is unique and no two are exactly the same. When working with wood and the antiquing process, each sign has its own warmth and charm. While we try to get the best wood available at the lumber yard, there are going to be some knots (blondewood only on backside) and other slight imperfections but that adds to the character of the sign as well as the antiquing process.

Thanks for stopping by our shop and please do not hesitate to ask questions.

results.title: Printable Holiday Card. Family Holiday Card. Christmas Greeting Card. Personalized Holiday Card. Family Photo Holiday Card. Custom Holidays.
results.description:
Welcome to BubbaLu Creations! Please read the details below and visit the policies page for more information. If you have any additional questions feel free to contact me via Etsy message or bubbalucreations@gmail.com

This holiday card is personalized just for you! Once I have your information, I will email you a proof of the design to the email associated with the order. The card will be customized with your photos and preferred text and sized 5”x7”.

***DIGITAL HOLIDAY CARD***
Please keep in mind, this is a PRINTABLE holiday card, you will not receive physical cards. You may choose to have a PDF or JPEG version of the final holiday card. You are then welcome to print them at any printing station or at home. 

*Print packages are available! Please contact me directly for a quote.*

PLACING YOUR ORDER
Choose your favorite holiday card design, then put your info in the personalization section and place your order. After placing your order, please email me your desired photos to be used to bubbalucreations@gmail.com. You may also send them to me through Etsy messages.  Once I receive confirmation of payment and the photos, I'll send you a proof within 24 hours. Once the design is to your liking, I'll send you the print-ready file.

ADDITIONAL PERSONALIZATION
I am happy to further customize your holiday card if you desire to have a different layout, colors, text or font. Please contact me via Etsy message with your request and if I am able to do the request I will give you a price quote and create a custom listing for you to purchase. 

PRINT COLOR DISCLAIMER
Every printer and monitor is calibrated differently. Colors may vary from the image shown depending on the equipment and paper that you use. Please contact the person responsible for printing directly for more information on adjusting print color settings if necessary.

If you have any questions feel free to contact me! I look forward to working with you!

results.title: LAUGH Wall Decor Word - Cutout, Home Decor, Unfinished and Available from 1 to 42 Inches Wide
results.description:
This wooden word comes unfinished and unpainted. Each is individually cut and is available in a variety of sizes ranging from 3 inches long to 42 inches long. You can hand paint, spray paint, decoupage, mod podge or apply any other type of surface treatment to the monogram. Great for decorating the family room or using for signage at parties, showers and weddings – any DIY project! 

SIZES/THICKNESS-
All items are laser cut (edges will be dark) from cabinet grade MDF. This method delivers the very best resolution and quality of cut.
1/8 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 16 inches long
1/4 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 18 inches long
3/8 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 42 inches long
1/2 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 42 inches long

WHY BUY FROM US?
- everything in our store ships FREE
- orders ship out the same business day or the next business day
- hassle free return policy
- we use strong and beautiful wood
- all products are laser cut - best possible quality with no sanding!
- everything made in the USA by a family

REVIEWS-
We know how important reviews are when purchasing online. Since we just opened this shop we don't have many reviews yet. We want you to be confident in your purchase. Please feel free to look at the reviews from our other etsy shop (Buildeez) until this shop (CrazyCutouts) gets more of its own: https://www.etsy.com/your/shops/Buildeez/reviews?ref=seller_platform_hdr 

HOW TO HANG THEM- 
For small to medium sized letters: double sided foam mounting tape works great. Hot gluing ribbon to the back and then hang it on a nail. You can use dots of hot glue on the back of the letter and adhere it directly to the surface you are hanging it on.
For the larger letters: it is good to use liquid nails if you want to permanently attach it to a surface. Or, you can also use sawtooth hanging hardware that can be found at any local hardware store. 

DON'T SEE WHAT YOU NEED?
Try our sister shop: https://www.etsy.com/shop/Buildeez?ref=hdr_shop_menu
Or convo us with any custom orders!

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love Pluggable Warmer
results.description:
Enjoy this pluggable warmer with the heartwarming phrase "live, laugh, love".

Pluggable Fragrance Warmers can be used in both vertical and horizontal outlets by twisting the plug base, making them ideal above counter outlets in small rooms and spaces. The soft glow of the halogen bulb creates the ambiance and fragrance of a lit candle, without flame, soot, or other pollutants.

results.title: Tumblers For Every Occasion
results.description:
Welcome to Little Details
Unique Products Just for You, WE Strive for Perfection. If you have any questions just shoot me a message.

Disclaimer
TUMBLER/CUP - These are handmade with love! Therefore, small imperfections (bubbles, waves, color mixing, glitter specks) may be present, are normal, and are not considered defects. No two items will be identical!!! These cups should NEVER be washed in the dishwasher or soaked for extended periods of time and NOT microwave safe. Hand wash only. Clients should treat tumblers as if it was made of GLASS! 

Materials - 3 layers of UV resistant 2-part epoxy resin (takes up to 72 hours (3days) to cure), made in the USA. Double walled stainless-steel tumbler. Details on the tumbler may include spray paint, glitter, color powder pigment or alcohol ink. All personized names, sayings, or silhouette are made with high quality vinyl or waterslide decals with a verity of fonts to pick from. Your new tumbler will never fade, flake, or peel! 

Shipping will occur once client is happy with their tumbler design and the tumbler is completely cured and inspected for no unusual defects. Tumblers can take 1-2 weeks before shipping as to insure NO unforeseen quality issues occur. 

Tumbler Sizes to pick from prices very on size.                                                                  
(Type of Tumbler not on list Message me I will be able to help)  
16oz Tumbler with black liner 
30oz & 20oz Modern Curve Tumbler 
30oz & 20oz Skinny Tumbler 
12oz Lowball Tumbler or Wine Tumbler  
10oz Coffee Mug  
Wine Tumbler Set (Great for Anniversaries) 

******** Due to the nature of how the product is made and personized, all sales are final. ********

BULK ORDERS                                                                                                                                                    
If you are interested in purchasing 3 or more tumblers, contact me prior to ordering. I will send you a 15% off coupon that will be valid for 24 hours only.

*** SHIPPING IS ALMOST ALWAYS CALCULATED HIGH WHEN COMBINING LISTINGS AND I WILL REFUND ANY OVERAGES PAID. ***

These are my handmade highly scented primitive large crow tarts or melts that are made with a special blend of paraffin wax that allows me to add up  to 10% more fragrance than most waxes.
 
They are scented to max with PATCHOULI. This strong fragrance was popular in the 70's and is still a classic today. A deep earthy, musky scent.

These look great as bowl fillers too and smell wonderful just sitting out for display without melting them. They also make great Easter gifts so please be sure to check my other listings for terrific smelling candles and tarts to go with your order.

Want more than 1 set of tarts, no problem! Special orders are always welcome and feel free to email for my scent list : homemadescents [!at] yahoo.com

Thanks for stopping by! Please do come back again soon.

results.title: Rude, offensive, funny ‘live, laugh, fuck off’ cross stitch
results.description: Rude, funny ‘live, laugh, fuck off’ cross stitch. Comes framed or in a 6” hoop. Not a live, laugh, love sorta person? Or know a friend who just loves the saying? With blue roses and italic font

results.title: Purple Dog Bow Tie collar, Pet wedding, dog birthday gift, Live Love Laugh , Wedding dog collar
Live, Laugh, Love Resin Keychain/ Red Smoke effect/ Resin Art/ Key Holder/ Bag Charm/ Gifts for her/ Unique Gifts/ Resin Keychain/ Keychain
results.description: This beautiful keychain is made of resin with a red smoke effect inside. Live, Laugh and Love everyday! Truly one of a kind with a heart charm!

results.title: Rude Alive Ahaha F*ck Sticker, Spooky Sticker, Witchy Gift, Funny Gift, Meme Gift, Witchy Vibes
results.description:
This small sticker is perfect for a crowded water bottle, lap top or other surface! It references a popular tiktok with a spooky snarky twist on live laugh love. A perfect gift for your funniest friend. 

Each sticker is made of high quality matte vinyl and is UV resistant, scratch resistant and dishwasher safe.

Height: 2 inches
Width 1.4 inches

results.title: Live Laugh Love Quote Candle Decal Glass Jar, Pick Scent & Color, Personalize it, Customized, Ships Free
results.description:
Reusable, sleek 12oz jars with “Live Laugh Love” durable vinyl decals. Metallic silver, if white preferred let me know. Happy to change and customize with your text and font choices. Can personalize the other side with a name.

The permanent image makes for a great keepsakes jar after the wax is gone, or use it to burn votives and tea lights.

Candle hand poured with soy blend wax, pick any dark color. 

Choose scent, if your looking for one not listed, message me. I may have it.

•Custom Orders Available 
•Discounts for more than one

If you’d like several or made with other choices, let me know I’ll make a new listing for you. I have lots of fragrances and can do most any wax and vinyl colors
